CSSStyleRule.summary: The CSSStyleRule interface represents a single CSS style rule.

CSSStyleRuleStyleMap.summary:
The styleMap read-only property of the
interface returns a object
which provides access to the rule's property-value pairs.

CSSStyleRuleStyle.summary: The read-only style property is the interface for the declaration block of the .
CSSStyleRuleStyle.value: A object, with the following properties:

CSSStyleRuleSelectorText.summary: The selectorText property of the interface gets and sets the selectors associated with the CSSStyleRule.
